.ThreadedConversation-tweet:after,
.ThreadedConversation-moreReplies:before,
.ThreadedConversation-viewOther:before,
.ThreadedConversation-unavailableTweet:before,
.ThreadedConversation-unavailableTweet:after,
.ThreadedConversation--permalinkTweetWithAncestors:before {
    background-color: #6A6A6A;
}




.tweet .sm-reply,
.tweet .sm-rt,
.tweet .sm-fav,
.tweet .sm-image,
.tweet .sm-video,
.tweet .sm-audio,
.tweet .sm-geo,

.tweet .sm-trash,
.tweet .sm-more,
.tweet .sm-page,
.tweet .sm-embed,
.tweet .sm-summary,
.tweet .sm-chat,

.timelines-navigation .active .profile-nav-icon,
.timelines-navigation .profile-nav-icon:hover,
.timelines-navigation .profile-nav-link:focus .profile-nav-icon,

.sm-top-tweet {
    background-color: #080808;
}

.enhanced-mini-profile .mini-profile .profile-summary {
  background-image: url(https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/20523846/1398717616/mobile);
}

  #global-tweet-dialog .modal-header {
    border-bottom: solid 1px rgba(8, 8, 8, .25);
  }

  #global-tweet-dialog .modal-tweet-form-container {
    background-color: #080808;
    background: rgba(8, 8, 8, .1);
  }

  .inline-reply-tweetbox {
    background-color: #E6E6E6;
  }

</style>

     <div id="geo-disabled-dropdown">
      <div tabindex="-1">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <span class="caret-outer"></span>
    <span class="caret-inner"></span>
  </div>
  <ul>
    <li class="geo-not-enabled-yet">
      <h2>Add a location to your Tweets</h2>
      <p>
        When you tweet with a location, Twitter stores that location.&#32;
        You can switch location on/off before each Tweet and always have the option to delete your location history.
        <a href="http://support.twitter.com/forums/26810/entries/78525" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a>
      </p>
      <div>
        <button type="button" class="geo-turn-on btn primary-btn">Turn location on</button>
        <button type="button" class="geo-not-now btn-link">Not now</button>
      </div>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

    </div>

      <div class="modal-body">
        
<div class="list-editor">
  <div class="field">
    <label class="t1-label" for="list-name">List name</label>
    <input id="list-name" type="text" class="text" name="name" value="" />
  </div>
  <hr/>

  <div class="field">
    <label class="t1-label" for="list-description">Description</label>
    <textarea id="list-description" name="description"></textarea>
    <span class="help-text">Under 100 characters, optional</span>
  </div>
  <hr/>

  <fieldset class="field">
    <legend class="t1-legend">Privacy</legend>
    <div class="options">
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-public-radio">
        <input class="radio" type="radio" name="mode" id="list-public-radio" value="public" checked="checked"  />
        <b>Public</b> &middot; Anyone can follow this list
      </label>
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-private-radio">
        <input class="radio" type="radio" name="mode" id="list-private-radio" value="private"  />
        <b>Private</b> &middot; Only you can access this list
      </label>
    </div>
  </fieldset>
  <hr/>

  <div class="list-editor-save">
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary update-list-button" data-list-id="">Save list</button>
  </div>

</div>

      </div>
    </div>

  <script id="composition_state" nonce="uDuoxYplqqBkzJ86Vvxiag==">
    !function(){function t(t){t.target.setAttribute("data-in-composition","true")}function n(t){t.target.removeAttribute("data-in-composition")}document.addEventListener&&(document.addEventListener("compositionstart",t,!1),document.addEventListener("compositionend",n,!1))}();

            <li><a href="?lang=zh-tw" data-lang-code="zh-tw" title="Traditional Chinese" class="js-language-link js-tooltip" rel="noopener"></a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
      <div class="js-front-language">
        <form action="/sessions/change_locale" class="t1-form language" method="POST">
          <input type="hidden" name="lang"> <input type="hidden" name="redirect">
          <input type="hidden" name="authenticity_token" value="c2ba562165b461f512faef1fdeda605473172103">
        </form>
      </div>
    </li>
  </ul>

    <li role="presentation" data-user-id="" data-user-screenname="" data-remote="true" data-score="" class="typeahead-item typeahead-selected-item js-selectable">

          <span class="select-status deselect-user js-deselect-user Icon Icon--check"></span>
          <span class="select-status select-disabled Icon Icon--unfollow"></span>
          <span class="fullname"></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified js-verified hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span><span class="Icon Icon--protected js-protected hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Protected Tweets</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b></b></span>

<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-firefox">

    </ul>
  </script>
<script pagespeed_orig_type='text/javascript' type="text/psajs" orig_index="10">r7ad.printGAds([1000,1000],'DHTML');</script>
<div id="ads-sniffer" style="overflow:hidden; margin:0 auto; width:1024px; position:relative; top:10px; display: none;">
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="11">function fechaAds(){ads=document.getElementById('ads-sniffer');ads.parentNode.removeChild(ads);}</script>
<a id="closeBtn" style="z-index:1; cursor:pointer; position: absolute; right:0; top:0; width:61px; height:17px; background-image:url(https://img.r7.com/images/2017/01/05/957hd2p3f5_8gp35i3xl7_file)" onclick="fechaAds()">&#160;</a>
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="12">r7ad.printGAds([1024,60],'Sniffer').success(function(){document.getElementById('ads-sniffer').style.display='block';});</script>

<h6 class="r7headline">

<div class="title-box">
<h2 class="headline title" data-headline="title_box" data-item="title">

        <script type='text/javascript'>
          var makeShortcut = function(keyNumber, locationHref, fn) {
            var shortcuts = [
                'alt+' + keyNumber,
                'shift+alt+' + keyNumber,
                'command+' + keyNumber,
                'ctrl+' + keyNumber
            ],
            _fn = fn || function() {
                window.location = locationHref;
            };
            Mousetrap.bind(shortcuts, function() {
                _fn();
                return false;
            });
          };
          // página inicial
          makeShortcut(1, '');
          // ir para conteúdo
          makeShortcut(2, '#', function() {
              scroll(0,0);
          });
          // mapa do site
          makeShortcut(3, '');
          // foco no campo de busca
          makeShortcut(4, '');
          // informações de contato (página Fale com o R7)
          makeShortcut(9, '');
          // detalhes das teclas de atalho (página Acessibilidade)
          makeShortcut(0, '');
        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function mascara(o,f){
    v_obj=o
    v_fun=f
    setTimeout("execmascara()",1)
}
function execmascara(){
    v_obj.value=v_fun(v_obj.value)
}
function mtel(v){
    v=v.replace(/\D/g,"");             //Remove tudo o que não é dígito
    v=v.replace(/^(\d{2})(\d)/g,"($1) $2"); //Coloca parênteses em volta dos dois primeiros dígitos
    v=v.replace(/(\d)(\d{4})$/,"$1-$2");    //Coloca hífen entre o quarto e o quinto dígitos
    return v;
}
function mdata(v){
    v=v.replace(/\D/g,"");                    //Remove tudo o que não é dígito
    v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2");
    v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2");

    v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{2})$/,"$1$2");
    return v;
}
/*
function email_popup(link){
	window.open(link, "", "width=600,height=600" );
	return false;
}*/
jQuery(document).ready(function(){

	if(history.pushState) {
		if(document.location.hash != ""){
			history.pushState('Comercial Record','Comercial Record', document.location.origin+document.location.pathname);
		}

	}

	jQuery(".search-plus").click(function(){
		jQuery(this).next(".search-open").css("display", "block");

		return false;
	});


	jQuery(".search-plus").click(function(){
		jQuery(this).next(".search-open").css("display", "block");

		return false;
	});
	jQuery(".search-advanced .search-close").click(function(){
		jQuery(".search-open").css("display", "none");

		return false;
	});

	jQuery("#dtaini").attr('onkeyup', "mascara(this, mdata);");
	jQuery("#dtafim").attr('onkeyup', "mascara(this, mdata);");


	jQuery("#form-search-advanced").submit(function(){

		var action = jQuery(this).attr("action");
		var search = jQuery("#s-adv").val();
		action += "?s="+search;

		jQuery(this).attr("action", action);

		return true;
	});
/*
	jQuery(".switch").each(function(){
		var switches = jQuery(".switch");
		jQuery(this).children("select").change(function(){
			var value = jQuery(this).val();
			if (value != ""){
				switches.addClass("deactive");
				jQuery(this).parent().removeClass("deactive");
			}else{
				switches.removeClass("deactive");
			}
		});
	});*/


	document.getElementsByName('nome')[0].placeholder = 'Nome:';
	jQuery('#nome').prop('required',true);

	document.getElementsByName('email')[0].placeholder = 'E-mail:';
	jQuery('#email').prop('required',true);
	jQuery("#telefone").attr('onkeyup', "mascara(this, mtel);");

	document.getElementsByName('empresa')[0].placeholder = 'Empresa:';
	document.getElementsByName('telefone')[0].placeholder = 'Telefone';

	document.getElementsByName('assunto')[0].placeholder = 'Assunto:';
	jQuery('#assunto').prop('required',true);

	document.getElementsByName('mensagem')[0].placeholder = 'Mensagem';
	jQuery('#mensagem').prop('required',true);

	jQuery(".contact-title").click(function(){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "block");

		return false;
	});
	jQuery(".form-contact .search-close").click(function(){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "none");

		return false;
	});

	if (jQuery(".wpcf7-mail-sent-ok").length == 1){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "block");
	}

	if (jQuery(".wpcf7-validation-errors").length == 1){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "block");
	}

	jQuery('.wpcf7-submit').click(function(){
			var id = $(".wpcf7-form").parent().attr("id");
	   	jQuery('.wpcf7-form').attr('action', document.location+'#'+id);
	});

	if(navigator.appName.indexOf("Internet Explorer")!=-1){     //yeah, he's using IE
	    var badBrowser = navigator.appVersion.indexOf("MSIE 9") != -1;

	    if(badBrowser){
	        // navigate to error page
					jQuery('.socials-open').click(function(){
						jQuery(this).toggleClass('show');

						return false;
					});
	    }
	}

	if (/MSIE (\d+\.\d+);/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
		 var ieversion=new Number(RegExp.$1)
		 if (ieversion ==9){

				jQuery('#nome').attr('value','Nome:');
				jQuery('#empresa').attr('value','Empresa:');
				jQuery('#email').attr('value','E-mail:');
				jQuery('#telefone').attr('value','Telefone:');
				jQuery('#assunto').attr('value','Assunto:');
				jQuery('#mensagem').val('Mensagem:');

				jQuery('#nome').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#nome').val() == jQuery('#nome').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#nome').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#empresa').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#empresa').val() == jQuery('#empresa').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#empresa').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#email').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#email').val() == jQuery('#email').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#email').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#telefone').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#telefone').val() == jQuery('#telefone').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#telefone').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#assunto').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#assunto').val() == jQuery('#assunto').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#assunto').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#mensagem').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#mensagem').val() == jQuery('#mensagem').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#mensagem').val('');
					 }
				});


				jQuery('#s-adv').val('O que você procura?');
				jQuery('#s-adv').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#s-adv').val() == jQuery('#s-adv').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#s-adv').val('');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('.wpcf7-form').submit(function(){
					return validaForm(jQuery);

				});

		 }
    }




});


function validaForm($){
	var $error = 0;
		jQuery(".wpcf7-form input").each(function(){
			 if(jQuery(this).val().length < 1 || (jQuery(this).val() == jQuery(this).attr('title'))){
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-left-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-right-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-top-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-bottom-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 $error++;

			 }

		 });

		    if(jQuery('#mensagem').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-left-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-right-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-top-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-bottom-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 $error++;
			 }

			 if(jQuery('#nome').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#nome').attr('value','Nome:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#empresa').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#empresa').attr('value','Empresa:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#email').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#email').attr('value','E-mail:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#telefone').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#telefone').attr('value','Telefone:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#assunto').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#assunto').attr('value','Assunto:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#mensagem').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#mensagem').val('Mensagem:');
			 }

		if($error > 0){
	       return false;
		}else{
		   return true;
		}

}

</script>

<span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap email"><input type="text" name="email" value="" id="email" class="wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-email wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-use-title-as-watermark" size="40" title="E-mail:" /></span><br />
<span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap telefone"><input type="text" name="telefone" value="" id="telefone" class="wpcf7-text wpcf7-use-title-as-watermark" size="15" maxlength="15" title="Telefone:" /></span><br />

<span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap mensagem"><textarea name="mensagem" id="mensagem" class="wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-use-title-as-watermark" cols="40" rows="10" title="Mensagem:"></textarea></span><br />

				<div class="logo-title">
					<h3>PI Fácil</h3>
				</div>

					<div class="content-images">
						<img width="300" height="124" src="http://comercial.recordtv.com.br/files/2015/09/pi1-300x124.png" class="attachment-300x220sw wp-post-image" alt="pi" title="pi" />					</div>
					<div class="content-text">
						<p><b>Com interface intuitiva, o PI Fácil simplifica a efetivação do cadastro e controle de pedidos de inserções.</b></p>
<p>O serviço na nuvem garante a redução de custos e oferece a maneira mais organizada para o usuário trabalhar.<br />
Além de tudo, o PI Fácil apresenta grande quantidade de informações, como Tabela de Preços, Produtos ofertados, dentre outros, com diversos filtros que tornam as buscas realizadas pelos usuários muito mais simples, ágeis e certeiras.  </p>
<p><a href="http://pifacil.adsim.co/selecionarEmpresa.do;jsessionid=4252FB2E37CC3F044F26308C6882AE0E?metodo=exibirTelaSelecaoEmpresa" target="_blank">Acesse aqui a plataforma.</a></p>

          var makeShortcut = function(keyNumber, locationHref, fn) {
            var shortcuts = [
                'alt+' + keyNumber,
                'shift+alt+' + keyNumber,
                'command+' + keyNumber,
                'ctrl+' + keyNumber
            ],
            _fn = fn || function() {
                window.location = locationHref;
            };
            Mousetrap.bind(shortcuts, function() {
                _fn();
                return false;
            });
          };
          // página inicial
          makeShortcut(1, '');
          // ir para conteúdo
          makeShortcut(2, '#', function() {
              scroll(0,0);
          });
          // mapa do site
          makeShortcut(3, '');
          // foco no campo de busca
          makeShortcut(4, '');
          // informações de contato (página Fale com o R7)
          makeShortcut(9, '');
          // detalhes das teclas de atalho (página Acessibilidade)
          makeShortcut(0, '');
        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function mascara(o,f){
    v_obj=o
    v_fun=f
    setTimeout("execmascara()",1)
}
function execmascara(){
    v_obj.value=v_fun(v_obj.value)
}
function mtel(v){
    v=v.replace(/\D/g,"");             //Remove tudo o que não é dígito
    v=v.replace(/^(\d{2})(\d)/g,"($1) $2"); //Coloca parênteses em volta dos dois primeiros dígitos
    v=v.replace(/(\d)(\d{4})$/,"$1-$2");    //Coloca hífen entre o quarto e o quinto dígitos
    return v;
}
function mdata(v){
    v=v.replace(/\D/g,"");                    //Remove tudo o que não é dígito
    v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2");
    v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2");

    v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{2})$/,"$1$2");
    return v;
}
/*
function email_popup(link){
	window.open(link, "", "width=600,height=600" );
	return false;
}*/
jQuery(document).ready(function(){

	if(history.pushState) {
		if(document.location.hash != ""){
			history.pushState('Comercial Record','Comercial Record', document.location.origin+document.location.pathname);
		}

	}

	jQuery(".search-plus").click(function(){
		jQuery(this).next(".search-open").css("display", "block");

		return false;
	});


	jQuery(".search-plus").click(function(){
		jQuery(this).next(".search-open").css("display", "block");

		return false;
	});
	jQuery(".search-advanced .search-close").click(function(){
		jQuery(".search-open").css("display", "none");

		return false;
	});

	jQuery("#dtaini").attr('onkeyup', "mascara(this, mdata);");
	jQuery("#dtafim").attr('onkeyup', "mascara(this, mdata);");


	jQuery("#form-search-advanced").submit(function(){

		var action = jQuery(this).attr("action");
		var search = jQuery("#s-adv").val();
		action += "?s="+search;

		jQuery(this).attr("action", action);

		return true;
	});
/*
	jQuery(".switch").each(function(){
		var switches = jQuery(".switch");
		jQuery(this).children("select").change(function(){
			var value = jQuery(this).val();
			if (value != ""){
				switches.addClass("deactive");
				jQuery(this).parent().removeClass("deactive");
			}else{
				switches.removeClass("deactive");
			}
		});
	});*/


	document.getElementsByName('nome')[0].placeholder = 'Nome:';
	jQuery('#nome').prop('required',true);

	document.getElementsByName('email')[0].placeholder = 'E-mail:';
	jQuery('#email').prop('required',true);
	jQuery("#telefone").attr('onkeyup', "mascara(this, mtel);");

	document.getElementsByName('empresa')[0].placeholder = 'Empresa:';
	document.getElementsByName('telefone')[0].placeholder = 'Telefone';

	document.getElementsByName('assunto')[0].placeholder = 'Assunto:';
	jQuery('#assunto').prop('required',true);

	document.getElementsByName('mensagem')[0].placeholder = 'Mensagem';
	jQuery('#mensagem').prop('required',true);

	jQuery(".contact-title").click(function(){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "block");

		return false;
	});
	jQuery(".form-contact .search-close").click(function(){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "none");

		return false;
	});

	if (jQuery(".wpcf7-mail-sent-ok").length == 1){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "block");
	}

	if (jQuery(".wpcf7-validation-errors").length == 1){
		jQuery(".form-contact").css("display", "block");
	}

	jQuery('.wpcf7-submit').click(function(){
			var id = $(".wpcf7-form").parent().attr("id");
	   	jQuery('.wpcf7-form').attr('action', document.location+'#'+id);
	});

	if(navigator.appName.indexOf("Internet Explorer")!=-1){     //yeah, he's using IE
	    var badBrowser = navigator.appVersion.indexOf("MSIE 9") != -1;

	    if(badBrowser){
	        // navigate to error page
					jQuery('.socials-open').click(function(){
						jQuery(this).toggleClass('show');

						return false;
					});
	    }
	}

	if (/MSIE (\d+\.\d+);/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
		 var ieversion=new Number(RegExp.$1)
		 if (ieversion ==9){

				jQuery('#nome').attr('value','Nome:');
				jQuery('#empresa').attr('value','Empresa:');
				jQuery('#email').attr('value','E-mail:');
				jQuery('#telefone').attr('value','Telefone:');
				jQuery('#assunto').attr('value','Assunto:');
				jQuery('#mensagem').val('Mensagem:');

				jQuery('#nome').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#nome').val() == jQuery('#nome').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#nome').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#empresa').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#empresa').val() == jQuery('#empresa').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#empresa').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#email').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#email').val() == jQuery('#email').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#email').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#telefone').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#telefone').val() == jQuery('#telefone').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#telefone').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#assunto').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#assunto').val() == jQuery('#assunto').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#assunto').attr('value','');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('#mensagem').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#mensagem').val() == jQuery('#mensagem').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#mensagem').val('');
					 }
				});


				jQuery('#s-adv').val('O que você procura?');
				jQuery('#s-adv').on('click', function(){
					 if(jQuery('#s-adv').val() == jQuery('#s-adv').attr('title')){
						 jQuery('#s-adv').val('');
					 }
				});

				jQuery('.wpcf7-form').submit(function(){
					return validaForm(jQuery);

				});

		 }
    }




});


function validaForm($){
	var $error = 0;
		jQuery(".wpcf7-form input").each(function(){
			 if(jQuery(this).val().length < 1 || (jQuery(this).val() == jQuery(this).attr('title'))){
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-left-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-right-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-top-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery(this).css({"border-bottom-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 $error++;

			 }

		 });

		    if(jQuery('#mensagem').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-left-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-right-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-top-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 jQuery('#mensagem').css({"border-bottom-color" : "2px solid #F44336 !important;"});
				 $error++;
			 }

			 if(jQuery('#nome').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#nome').attr('value','Nome:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#empresa').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#empresa').attr('value','Empresa:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#email').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#email').attr('value','E-mail:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#telefone').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#telefone').attr('value','Telefone:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#assunto').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#assunto').attr('value','Assunto:');
			 }


			 if(jQuery('#mensagem').val().length < 1){
				 jQuery('#mensagem').val('Mensagem:');
			 }

		if($error > 0){
	       return false;
		}else{
		   return true;
		}

}

</script>
<!--[if lte IE 9]>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://comercial.recordtv.com.br/wp-content/themes/midia-kit-record/css/ie9.css" />

	<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function(){
	jQuery('.grid').masonry({
	  columnWidth: 320,
	  itemSelector: '.grid-item',
		"gutter": 20,
		percentPosition: true
	});
	jQuery(".filtro").click(function(){
		jQuery(this).parent().parent().toggleClass("closed");
		return false;
	});



	$("#filtrocases select:not([name='formato'])").each(function (){
		console.log($(this).attr("name"));

			var name = $(this).attr("name");

			$(this).change(function (){

				var $this = $(this);
				var value = $(this).val();
				if(!value){
					value = "NULL"
				}

			 var $next = $this.parent().next("label").attr("title",'Carregando...').children("select");
				$next.html("<option value=\"\">CARREGANDO...</option>");

				//console.log("http://comercial.recordtv.com.br/atlas/"+name+"/"+value);
				$.ajax({
					url: "http://comercial.recordtv.com.br/cases-local/"+name+"/"+value,
					dataType: "json",
					success: function (data){
						var name = $next.attr("id");
						var html = "<option value=\"\">"+name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+name.slice(1);"</option>";
						for( var i in data){
							var val = data[i];
							if(name == "estado"){
								val = val.toUpperCase();
							}
							html += "<option value=\""+data[i]['ID']+"\">"+val['value']+"</option>";
						}
						$next.html(html);
						var opt = jQuery('option:eq(0)', $next);
						var label = $next.parent().attr('title',opt.html());
					}
				})

				$(this).parent().nextAll("label:not([for='emissora'])").each(function (){
					var $label = $(this);
					var $select = $(this).children("select").change();
				})

			})

	})

                                <h2 data-animation="fadeInUp" data-delay="1s"><strong>Álvaro Rodrigues,</strong> Executivo de Criação</h2>
                                <p data-animation="fadeInUp" data-delay="1.4s">Com mais de 20 anos de experiência e passagens por agências como Africa SP, Africa Rio, DM9 Rio, Agência3, FCB Brasil, Ogilvy, VS e Doctor, o criativo tem 26 leões no currículo. Prêmios também no D&amp;AD, The One Show, Clio, FIAP, El Ojo, entre muitos outros. Duas vezes indicado ao Prêmio Caboré na categoria Criação. Duas vezes jurado no Festival de Cannes. Criador de campanhas de resultados para grandes marcas como Itaú, TIM, SC Johnson, Kraft Foods, FGV, Icatu Seguros, Suzuki, O Globo, GNT, Unimed, Acer, entre outras. Atual Presidente da ABP  Associação Brasileira de Propaganda.</p>

                    <div class="col-lg-2 col-md-2 col-xs-12 col-sm-12">
                        <ul class="social-network">
                            <li>
                                <a href="https://www.facebook.com/3AWWbr/" target="_blank"><img src="assets/images/icon-facebook.png" alt=""></a>
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/GrupoUnlike" target="_blank"><img src="assets/images/icon-youtube.png" alt=""></a>
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/3aww-brasil" target="_blank"><img src="assets/images/icon-linkedin.png" alt=""></a>
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- Deferred JavaScript -->
        <script src="assets/js/public.js"></script>

  <!-- Page -->
  
  <div class="page animsition">
    <div class="page-content padding-30-main container-fluid">
      

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-10 panel-content">
		<div class="body container" style="height:100%">
                

                

                
                

                
<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:20px;">
    <div class="span12">
        <center><h3 style="color: #777;">Categories</h3></center>
        <br>
        <table width="100%">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td id="menu-brawlers" width="33%" align="center" class="menu-selected"><h4>Black Market Brawlers</h4></td>
                <td id="menu-ability" width="33%" align="center" class="menu"><h4>Ability Power<br>Item Changes</h4></td>
                <td id="menu-itemsets" width="33%" align="center" class="menu"><h4>Item Set<br>Documentation</h4></td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table>
    </div>
    <div id="brawlers" class="span12">
        <br><br>
        <center><h5 style="color: #777; line-height: 25px;">"Given a data set of Black Market Brawlers match IDs, create a piece of software that utilizes the game data from these matches."</h5></center>
        <br><br>
        <h2>First Place</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <img src="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-api/api-challenge/2015/brawlersbay.png" align="right" style="width: 285px; margin-left: 10px;">
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/ElMarmos/Bilgewater-Brawlers-Bay/" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Bilgewater Brawlers Bay</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By VladLord Snow (LAN) and Juandx1 (LAN)</b></span></h4>
                There were a significant number of entries that focused around stats from Black Market Brawlers. Some focused heavily on stats others on a beautiful presentation. We chose Brawlers Bay as the winner of this category because of a notable balance of both. They explored multiple facets of this game mode ranging from champions, to the new items, and the brawlers themselves. The information provided for these facets were clean and easy to digest giving a great overall picture of the Black Market Brawlers game mode. A demo for their project can be found <a href="http://drillappsas.webfactional.com/" target="_blank">here</a>.
            </div>
        </div>
        <br><br>
        <h2>Runners-up</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/rpowers3/TheBlackMarket" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">The Black Market</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By KearinDragon (NA) and Agihor (NA)</b></span></h4>
                The level of analysis performed within this entry was truly amazing and noteworthy. It became apparent this team made it their mission to dive into every part of this game mode.
                <br><br>
            </div>
            <div>
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/Zaehiel/Regions-of-BMB" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Regions of Black Market Brawlers</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By Lìght (EUNE)</b></span></h4>
                This entry caught our eye because of it's focus on region more than anything else. The stats were all focused toward that end and we found it to provide insight into each region's meta and how it applies to win rate and item choices.
                <br><br>
            </div>
        </div>

    <div id="ability" class="span12" style="display: none;">
        <br><br>
        <center><h5 style="color: #777; line-height: 25px;">"Given two data sets of match IDs, one before the AP Item changes and another one after, create a piece of software to demonstrate changes in AP Item usage."</h5></center>
        <br><br>
        <h2>First Place</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <img src="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-api/api-challenge/2015/ripples.png" align="right" style="width: 285px; margin-left: 10px;">
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/maryschmidt/ripples" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Ripples</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By KateOfSpades (NA) and Praetor Kai (NA)</b></span></h4>
                We saw a lot of sites doing various analysis and comparisons between the patches before Ability Power Item Changes and after. What caught our eye about this entry how clear and easy it was to digest the information and even had the added bonus of a clever visualization of champion clusters based on builds. We found a lot of the entries either focused too intensely on a single topic or too generally on multiple topics. In the end, it hard to get a clear picture of what changed or how ability items were actually affected. This is where this entry excelled. It very clearly gave a view of the before and after and multiple ways of looking at the data before and after for items, champions, and popular builds.
            </div>
        </div>
        <br><br>
        <h2>Runners-up</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/protopizza/ApIsOp" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">AP is OP</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By aznchipmunk (NA) and helloso (NA)</b></span></h4>
                There were multiple reasons why this entry was interesting. From the champion selection to the predictive model. Even the application of the model to LCS games was very creative. A lot of good ideas emerged in this entry.
                <br><br>
            </div>
            <div>
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/Shadowen/Arsenal" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Arsenal</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By ShadowLight2143 (NA) and chabons (NA)</b></span></h4>
                This entry presented data in a unique and visual way. We've never seen a visualization like this and quite honestly were blown away. The presentation of data is an art and this piece nailed it.
                <br><br>
            </div>
        </div>
        <br><br>

    <div id="itemsets" class="span12" style="display: none;">
        <br><br>
        <center><h5 style="color: #777; line-height: 25px;">"Develop a piece of software that creates a benefit for players utilizing<br>the recent release of the Item Set documentation."</h5></center>
        <br><br>
        <h2>First Place</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <img src="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-api/api-challenge/2015/leaguesets.png" align="right" style="width: 285px; margin-left: 10px;">
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/ahmj/LeagueSets" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">LeagueSets</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By the gozaq (NA) and cheesh (NA)</b></span></h4>
                LeagueSets takes a nifty approach to creating Item Sets through a browser extension that automatically generates an Item Set from several websites that offer guides for various champions. The value that it provides for players through the use of pre-existing resources is something we couldn't ignore. This category was harder to judge than previously expected and what made this entry stand out among the others was it's overall utility and it's ability to be continually used on a daily basis. The prompt asked for something that created a benefit for players and this entry has the potential to create a ton of value.
            </div>
        </div>
        <br><br>
        <h2>Runners-up</h2>
        <div style="display: inline-block; width: 100%">
            <div>
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/Exofusion/builder.gg" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">builder.gg</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By Null Pointer (NA)</b></span></h4>
                This entry went a little above and beyond analyzing champions as well as the item sets themselves to give players a deeper look into what they were building and the stats gained from a specific build.
                <br><br>
            </div>
            <div>
                <h4 style="margin-bottom: 0;"><a href="https://github.com/angrytoad/ItemFeed" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">ItemFeed</a> <span style="color: #555; font-size: 21px;"><b>By Angrytoad (EUW) and Jonny le rapiste (EUW)</b></span></h4>
                There was no shortage of item set builders, this entry made it a guided experience which we loved. Many of the item set builders packed all the choices on one screen, but this entry spread it out so the user could make clear and easy choices one step at a time.
                <br><br>
            </div>
        </div>
        <br><br>
        <h2>Item Set Entries</h2>
        <a href="https://github.com/IEACATADB/aim_assist" target="_blank">Aim Assist</a> by verbal amuse (EUW) and Kriers (NA)<br>
        <a href="https://github.com/haersh/lol_api_contest" target="_blank">App: LoL Item Set Editor</a> by Azein (EUW) and Builat (EUW)<br>

<script>
    $('#menu-brawlers').click(function() {
        $('#menu-brawlers').attr("class", "menu-selected");
        $('#menu-ability').attr("class", "menu");
        $('#menu-itemsets').attr("class", "menu");

        $('#brawlers').show();
        $('#ability').hide();
        $('#itemsets').hide();
    });

    $('#menu-ability').click(function() {
        $('#menu-brawlers').attr("class", "menu");
        $('#menu-ability').attr("class", "menu-selected");
        $('#menu-itemsets').attr("class", "menu");

        $('#brawlers').hide();
        $('#ability').show();
        $('#itemsets').hide();
    });

    $('#menu-itemsets').click(function() {
        $('#menu-brawlers').attr("class", "menu");
        $('#menu-ability').attr("class", "menu");
        $('#menu-itemsets').attr("class", "menu-selected");

        $('#brawlers').hide();
        $('#ability').hide();
        $('#itemsets').show();
    });
</script>

		jQuery('.seccion').addClass("bt-hidden").viewportChecker({
			classToAdd: 'bt-show animated fadeIn',
			classToRemove: 'bt-hidden',
			offset: 150
		});

		jQuery('.section-container').addClass("bt-hidden").viewportChecker({
			classToAdd: 'bt-show animated slideInUp',
			classToRemove: 'bt-hidden',
			offset: 150
		});

		$("#home-link").click(function() {
			event.preventDefault();
			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: $("#home-anchor").offset().top
			}, 1000);
			closeNav();
		});

		$("#overview-link").click(function() {

			var nav = 85;

			if($( window ).width() < 768){
				nav = 50;
			}

			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: $("#overview-anchor").offset().top - nav
			}, 1000);
			closeNav();
		});

		$("#apps-link").click(function() {

			var nav = 85;

			if($( window ).width() < 768){
				nav = 50;
			}

			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: $("#apps-anchor").offset().top -nav
			}, 1000);
			closeNav();
		});

		$("#community-link").click(function() {

			var nav = 85;

			if($( window ).width() < 768){
				nav = 50;
			}

			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: $("#community-anchor").offset().top -nav
			}, 1000);
			closeNav();
		});

		$("#download-link").click(function() {

			var nav = 85;

			if($( window ).width() < 768){
				nav = 50;
			}

			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: $("#download-anchor").offset().top -nav
			}, 1000);
			closeNav();
		});

		$("#contact-link").click(function() {

			var nav = 85;

			if($( window ).width() < 768){
				nav = 50;
			}

			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: $("#contact-anchor").offset().top -nav
			}, 1000);
			closeNav();
		});

		function closeNav(){
			if($(window).width() < 768){
				$('.navbar-toggle').click();
			}
		}

	</script>

</body>
</html>

  <!-- Page -->
  
  <div class="page animsition">
    <div class="page-content padding-30-main container-fluid">
      

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-10 panel-content">
		<div class="span9">
        <h2 style="margin-bottom:20px;">Item Sets</h2>
        An item set is a custom set of items that are displayed within the in-game item shop. They are included in a drop down along with the Recommended Items. Customized item sets can be added to the item shop by creating specially formatted JSON files in the League of Legends config.<br><br>

        <h4 style="margin-bottom:15px;">File Location</h4>
        Item sets are stored within the League of Legends <span style="color:#FF9700; font-weight: bold;">config</span> directory. There are two paths for item sets depending on if they are global or champion specific. The file path for champion specific item sets is based on the key that is associated with each champion. The <span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">champion key</span> can be found using the <a href="/api-methods/#lol-static-data-v1.2" target="_blank"><b>static data API</b></a>.<br><br>

        <b>Global</b>
        <pre>League of Legends\<span style="color:#FF9700; font-weight: bold;">Config</span>\Global\Recommended\</pre><br>

        <b>Champion Specific</b>
        <pre>League of Legends\<span style="color:#FF9700; font-weight: bold;">Config</span>\Champions\<span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">{championKey}</span>\Recommended\
<span style="color:#999;">League of Legends\Config\Champions\MonkeyKing\Recommended\</span></pre><br>

        <h4 style="margin-bottom:15px;">Reserved File Names</h4>
        You can place any number of JSON files in the item set directories, however there are several reserved file names. The game will automatically replace any files that conflict with any of the following file names:<br><br>

        <pre><span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">{championKey}</span>SR.json
<span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">{championKey}</span>TT.json
<span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">{championKey}</span>DM.json
<span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">{championKey}</span>ASC.json
<span style="color:#0000FF; font-weight: bold;">{championKey}</span>PG.json

<span style="color:#999;">// Example
MonkeyKingSR.json
MonkeyKingTT.json
MonkeyKingDM.json
MonkeyKingASC.json
MonkeyKingPG.json</span></pre><br>

        <h2 style="margin-bottom:20px;">Item Set JSON</h2>
        <h4 style="margin-bottom:15px;">Item Set Details</h4>
        <pre>{
    "title": <span style="color:#347C2C">"The name of the page"</span>,
    "type": <span style="color:#347C2C">"custom"</span>,
    "map": <span style="color:#347C2C">"any"</span>,
    "mode": <span style="color:#347C2C">"any"</span>,
    "priority": <span style="color:#b22222;">false</span>,
    "sortrank": <span style="color:#0000FF;">0</span>,
    "blocks": [
        <span style="color:#999;">...   // Array of blocks</span>
    ]
}</pre>

        <table class="table attr">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td><b>title</b></td>
                <td>The name of the item set as you would see it in the drop down.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>type</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>Can be <code>custom</code> or <code>global</code>. This field is only used for grouping and sorting item sets. Custom item sets are ordered above global item sets. This field does not govern whether an item set available for every champion. To make an item set available for every champion, the JSON file must be placed an item set in the global folder.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>map</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>The map this item set will appear on. Can be <code>any</code>, Summoner's Rift <code>SR</code>, Howling Abyss <code>HA</code>, Twisted Treeline <code>TT</code>, or Crystal Scar <code>CS</code>.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>mode</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>The mode this item set will appear on. Can be <code>any</code>, <code>CLASSIC</code>, <code>ARAM</code>, or Dominion <code>ODIN</code>.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>priority</b></td>
                <td>Selectively sort this item set above other item sets. Overrides <b>sortrank</b>, but not <b>type</b>. Defaults to <code>false</code>.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>sortrank</b></td>
                <td>The order in which this item set will be sorted within a specific <b>type</b>. Item sets are sorted in descending order.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>blocks</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>The sections within an item set.</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table>

        <h4 style="margin-bottom:15px;">Block Details</h4>
        <pre>"blocks": [
    {
        "type": <span style="color:#347C2C">"A block with just boots"</span>,
        "recMath": <span style="color:#b22222;">false</span>,
        "minSummonerLevel": <span style="color:#0000FF;">-1</span>,
        "maxSummonerLevel": <span style="color:#0000FF;">-1</span>,
        "showIfSummonerSpell": <span style="color:#347C2C">""</span>,
        "hideIfSummonerSpell": <span style="color:#347C2C">""</span>,
        "items": [
            <span style="color:#999;">...   // Array of items</span>
        ]
    },
    <span style="color:#999;">...   // Additional blocks</span>
]</pre>
        <table class="table attr">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td><b>type</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>The name of the block as you would see it in the item set.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>recMath</b></td>
                <td>Use the tutorial formatting when displaying items in the block. All items within the block are separated by a plus sign with the last item being separated by an arrow indicating that the other items build into the last item. Defaults to <code>false</code>.<br><br>
                    <img style="width: 400px; height: 100px;" src="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-developer-portal/docs/recMath.png"><br></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>minSummonerLevel</b></td>
                <td>The minimum required account level for the block to be visible to the player. Defaults to <code>-1</code> which is equivalent to "any account level."</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>maxSummonerLevel</b></td>
                <td>The maximum allowed account level for the block to be visible to the player. Defaults to <code>-1</code> which is equivalent to "any account level."</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>showIfSummonerSpell</b></td>
                <td>Only show the block if the player has equipped a specific summoner spell. Can be any valid summoner spell key, e.g. <code>SummonerDot</code>. Defaults to an empty string. Will not override <b>hideIfSummonerSpell</b>.<br><br>
                    Summoner spell data can be viewed through the <a href="/api-methods/#lol-static-data-v1.2" target="_blank"><b>static data API</b></a>.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>hideIfSummonerSpell</b></td>
                <td>Hide the block if the player has equipped a specific summoner spell. Can be any valid summoner spell key, e.g. <code>SummonerDot</code>. Defaults to an empty string. Overrides <b>showIfSummonerSpell</b>.<br><br>
                    Summoner spell data can be viewed through the <a href="/api-methods/#lol-static-data-v1.2" target="_blank"><b>static data API</b></a>.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>items</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>An array of items to be displayed within the block.</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table>

        <h4 style="margin-bottom:15px;">Item Details</h4>
        <pre>"items": [
    {
        "id": <span style="color:#347C2C">"1001"</span>,
        "count": <span style="color:#0000FF;">1</span>
    },
    <span style="color:#999;">...   // Additional items</span>
]</pre>
        <table class="table attr">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td><b>id</b><br><span class="required">required</span></td>
                <td>The item id as a string, e.g. <code>"1001"</code>.</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td><b>count</b></td>
                <td>The number of times this item should be purchased. The count is displayed in the bottom right of the item icon. The indicator counts down whenever the item is purchased. If the count reaches 0 the item will show a check mark indicating the item has been completed. Defaults to <code>0</code>.</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table>

        <h4 style="margin-bottom:15px;">Example File</h4>
        <pre>{
    "title": <span style="color:#347C2C">"The name of the page"</span>,
    "type": <span style="color:#347C2C">"custom"</span>,
    "map": <span style="color:#347C2C">"any"</span>,
    "mode": <span style="color:#347C2C">"any"</span>,
    "priority": <span style="color:#b22222;">false</span>,
    "sortrank": <span style="color:#0000FF;">0</span>,
    "blocks": [
        {
            "type": <span style="color:#347C2C">"A block with just boots"</span>,
            "recMath": <span style="color:#b22222;">false</span>,
            "minSummonerLevel": <span style="color:#0000FF;">-1</span>,
            "maxSummonerLevel": <span style="color:#0000FF;">-1</span>,
            "showIfSummonerSpell": <span style="color:#347C2C">""</span>,
            "hideIfSummonerSpell": <span style="color:#347C2C">""</span>,
            "items": [
                {
                    "id": <span style="color:#347C2C">"1001"</span>,
                    "count": <span style="color:#0000FF;">1</span>
                },
                <span style="color:#999;">...   // Additional items</span>
            ]
        },
        <span style="color:#999;">...   // Additional blocks</span>
    ]
}</pre>
        You can download a sample item set JSON file here: <a href="https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-developer-portal/docs/item-set.json" target="_blank"><b>https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/riot-developer-portal/docs/item-set.json</b></a>
</div>
	</div>
</div>


    </div>
  </div>
